name: Gmail-reader
description: A simple python script that fetches emails from gmail using IMAP protocol. The IMAP port forwarding must be enabled in the intended gmail account for this script to work.

name: opencv-utilities
description: collection of some scripts to make installing and using OpenCV easier

name: Scrapy-projects
description: This is a collection of some of my web scraping projects in scrapy framework

name: Skeletor-animation-arduino
description: Skeletor  animation on a 0.96" OLED with Arduino UNO.

name: Snake-game-python-pygame
description: A simple remake of classic arcade game of Snake in python using pygame module
